Text: Thank you so much for this and many others.May I ask you to put up the TV series the game of thrones this way by it self? If you can thanks much , If you can't thanks as well .

@bigbandbilly: It is a combination of well known low (read miserable) efficiency of all torrent clients (programs) in case of so called "partial downloads" and "modern times", namely, by nature modern lines are asymmetrical (1000 kB/s download speed but only 50 kB/s upload) what practically diminishes EXCHANGE of bytes already present in "swarm" - feature on torrents rely on. 

Nowadays 98% of people in swarm are pure leechers - they suck others dry and give shit to others. When you place request to those swarm members - and you can place limited number of such requests in given time, you get zero, and you waste your request asking hard-fisting bastards.

Now - myself, my program, can establish also limited number of connections - and we (our programs) practically could never "meet" each other, like you shouting "Gimme me, gimme me" in middle of some crowd of local punks and hooligans which always find the way to fuck others up, get what they want and - run away.

Then - they practically make all what has been given to them to dissapear, forever - and seeders, who are there just to "replenish" network losses - must somehow give bytes taken away.
It cannot work better.

I cannot pay for more upload slots - and I cannot with just two slots I have for TV shows do nothing more - or more convenient for downloaders. I simply can't. Sorry.
@bdlnaredi: Supernatural has 2 weeks long break -  next airing is on May 20. Not today, nor tomorrow.
hope u will do Drive Angry and rio r5.......

I always seed - but the last couple of weeks utorrent is constantly giving me red x's (error code) as soon as it completes dl and tries to seed. It's frustrating as I know folks want faster dl's and I can't seem to get in a seeding swarm.

@LJE111: Options>Preferences>Queueing>Queue settings:
set Maximum number of active torrents (download or upload) to 98 - this number limits the number of torrents you have active at a time
and below, Maximum number of active downloads at 28
Options>Preferences>Bandwidth: 
set Global maximum number of active connections on 128, Maximum number of connected peers per torrent to 56 and Number of upload slots per torrent to 12.
UN-tick "Use additional slots if...".


This are the settings I have. Experiment a little, but not too much.
Pls download other episodes as well.....thanks....
